title: DKF 63 :: głosowanie 2/2 :: film & termin
opis: Oznacz proszę poniżej swoje preferencje co do filmu i terminu następnego spotkania
opis_en: Please input below your preferences concerning the film and date

filmy.title: Sicko
filmy.popup-director: Michael Francis Moore is an American film director, producer, screenwriter, and author. Moore\'s work frequently addresses various social, political, and economic topics. He first became publicly known for his award-winning debut documentary Roger & Me, a scathing look at the downfall of the automotive industry in 1980s Flint and Detroit.

filmy.title: That Obscure Object of Desire
filmy.popup-director: Luis Buñuel Portolés was a Spanish filmmaker who worked in France, Mexico and Spain. He has been widely considered by many film critics, historians and directors to be one of the greatest and most influential filmmakers of all time. Buñuel\'s works were known for their avant-garde surrealism which were also infused with political commentary.

filmy.title: Psy
filmy.popup-director: Władysław Pasikowski is a Polish film director and screenwriter.

filmy.title: The Boys
filmy.popup-director: Rowan Woods is an Australian AACTA Award-winning film and television director, best known for the 1998 film The Boys and the 2016 television drama series The Kettering Incident.

filmy.title: Popiół i diament
filmy.popup-director: Andrzej Witold Wajda was a Polish film and theatre director. Recipient of an Honorary Oscar, the Palme d\'Or, as well as Honorary Golden Lion and Honorary Golden Bear Awards, he was a prominent member of the "Polish Film School". He was known especially for his trilogy of war films consisting of A Generation (1955), Kanał (1957) and Ashes and Diamonds (1958).

filmy.title: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
filmy.originalTitle: Le charme discret de la bourgeoisie
filmy.popup-director: Luis Buñuel Portolés was a Spanish filmmaker who worked in France, Mexico and Spain. He has been widely considered by many film critics, historians and directors to be one of the greatest and most influential filmmakers of all time. Buñuel\'s works were known for their avant-garde surrealism which were also infused with political commentary.
